results.content:
I was looking for a course to help me optimize my websites to perform better. I'm glad I found this training!

Course is full of practical tips, examples and resources. You not only get step by step instructions how to resolve problems, but it's also presented how important and how complex the issues are. Besides that, optimization techniques shown in the presentations are really clever! Enjoy!
PS In some parts playback speed can seem slow, but you can increase it to 1,25x and it’s perfectly fine.
results.content_html:

PS In some parts playback speed can seem slow, but you can increase it to 1,25x and it’s perfectly fine.

results.content: Great tools and tips presented! However, I personally would like to see practical work and testing the scripts live. Presentation is a bit boring and background music is making me sleepy after just 5mins.
